Package index

Data Summary Tables

Standard Summary Tables

tbl_summary()
Summary table
add_p(<tbl_summary>)
Add p-values
add_q()
Add multiple comparison adjustment
add_overall()
Add overall column
add_difference(<tbl_summary>)
Add differences between groups
add_n(<tbl_summary>) add_n(<tbl_svysummary>) add_n(<tbl_likert>)
Add column with N
add_ci()
Add CI Column
add_stat_label() questioning
Add statistic labels
add_stat()
Add a custom statistic
separate_p_footnotes() questioning
Create footnotes for individual p-values

Output Types

as_gt()
Convert gtsummary object to gt
as_flex_table()
Convert gtsummary object to a flextable object

Convert gtsummary object to a kable object

Convert gtsummary object to a kableExtra object
as_hux_table() as_hux_xlsx()
Convert gtsummary object to a huxtable object
as_tibble(<gtsummary>) as.data.frame(<gtsummary>)
Convert gtsummary object to a tibble
